description.value: You dash past an opponent, confounding them with underhanded tactics. Stride up to half your speed. You can attempt a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Dirty Trick] (if you have that action) against one opponent you pass within range of at any point during your movement.
